snippet: Secretary of State John Kerry said his team would be looking for important signs that Syria and Russia were serious about securing and disposing of Syria’s chemical weapons.
abstract: Sec of State John Kerry says his team will be looking for important signs that Syria and Russia are serious about securing and disposing of Syria’s chemical weapons to avoid an American-led military strike.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and STEVEN LEE MYERS
byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from Geneva, and Steven Lee Myers from Moscow.

lead_paragraph: Secretary of State John Kerry said his team would be looking for important signs that Syria and Russia were serious about securing and disposing of Syria’s chemical weapons.

headline.main: Kerry Insists That Syria Quickly Give Data on Arms
headline.print_headline: Kerry Insists That Syria Quickly Give Data on Arms

keywords.value: Arms Control and Limitation and Disarmament
